vulnerability.name: USN-6933-1
vulnerability.description: It was discovered that ClickHouse incorrectly handled memory, leading to a heap out-of-bounds data read. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service, or leak sensitive information. (CVE-2021-42387, CVE-2021-41388)  It was discovered that ClickHouse incorrectly handled memory, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service, or execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2021-43304, CVE-2021-43305)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in ClickHouse.
